reviews.name: John Smith
reviews.comment: Life on the Road: As a truck driver, I am the captain of my own ship. I navigate the highways, delivering goods across the country. From the breathtaking scenery to the sense of freedom, every day is an adventure. Join me on this journey and experience the thrill of the open road.

reviews.name: Jennifer Adams
reviews.comment: Behind the Scenes: As a dispatcher, I am the orchestrator of logistics. I ensure that deliveries are coordinated seamlessly, optimizing routes and schedules. From managing driver assignments to troubleshooting, I keep the operation running smoothly. Join our team and be part of the backbone that keeps goods moving.

reviews.name: Emily Johnson
reviews.comment: Mastering Efficiency: As a logistics manager, I oversee the entire supply chain. From coordinating shipments to optimizing warehouse operations, I ensure that goods are delivered on time and within budget. Join me in this dynamic role and make a significant impact on the success of our operations.

reviews.name: Michael Brown
reviews.comment: Driving Innovation: As a technical specialist, I am responsible for maintaining and repairing the fleet of trucks. From diagnosing mechanical issues to implementing new technologies, I ensure that our vehicles are safe and efficient. Join our team and be at the forefront of technological advancements in the trucking industry.

reviews.name: Sarah Davis
reviews.comment: Building the Dream Team: As a recruiter, I am on a mission to find talented individuals who are passionate about trucking. From conducting interviews to evaluating qualifications, I connect skilled drivers with rewarding opportunities. Join me in shaping the future of our team and embark on a fulfilling career in the trucking industry.

whyUs.title: 24/7 Support
whyUs.description: Our dispatch is not only capable of answering calls and making updates, they are well-trained and able to solve all uncommon situations and make proper decisions.

whyUs.title: Monthly Bonuses
whyUs.description: We award monthly bonuses to drivers who perform exceptionally well. If you work hard and avoid violations, you could be among the top five drivers and receive a bonus.

whyUs.title: Personal Dispatcher
whyUs.description: After signing up, you’ll fill out a questionnaire to determine your drive style. Based on your preferences, we assign a dispatcher who specializes in the type of loads you prefer.

whyUs.title: Weekly Deposit
whyUs.description: We make weekly deposits. You can reach our accounting department to know the amount of your upcoming paycheck and which loads will be paid. A detailed report is sent weekly via email.

whyUs.title: Absolute Transparency
whyUs.description: One of our main principles is honesty. You'll receive all rate confirmations directly from the broker, ensuring transparency in all operations. This includes the broker’s name, phone number, and the rate of the load.

whyUs.title: Flexible Schedule
whyUs.description: We value work-life balance. Our flexible scheduling accommodates your personal commitments, ensuring operational efficiency while respecting your personal time and well-being.

jobsBenefits.title: No Forced Dispatch
jobsBenefits.description: Either you are an Owner-Operator or a Company driver, the dispatcher will call you and offer a load and it's up to you to decide whether you want to go for it or not. It's important to us that you take your time, analyze all the details of the load and then give an answer with full responsibility.

jobsBenefits.title: No Hidden Fees
jobsBenefits.description: We have a list of all the fees possible that we are showing on the face-to-face interview. Nothing except that will ever come out of your paycheck.

jobsBenefits.title: Monthly Bonuses
jobsBenefits.description: We do have monthly awards for the drivers that performed great during the month. If you work hard and don't get violations during a specified period, you are likely to get into the top five drivers of the month and get your bonus added to the following paycheck.

jobsBenefits.title: Absolute Transparency
jobsBenefits.description: One of the main principles of the company is honesty. This is what we hear very often from our drivers when asking them for some feedback. You will get all the rate confirmations forwarded directly from the broker along with the broker's name, phone number and the rate of the load.

jobsBenefits.title: Personal Dispatcher
jobsBenefits.description: Once you sign up with a company, you will fill out a questionnaire which will determine your drive style. According to preferences, you will be assigned a dispatcher who specializes in the type of loads you are looking for. However, after a trial period you can request to try another dispatcher and it will be totally normal. It's in our interest to have you guys working with a person that you are comfortable dealing with.

jobsBenefits.title: Weekly Deposit
jobsBenefits.description: We make deposits every week. You can also reach our accounting and get the amount of upcoming pay-check and find out which loads will be paid. You will also receive a report every week via email with a detailed breakdown of all loads completed and deductions that occurred during the period.

jobsBenefits.title: 24/7 Support
jobsBenefits.description: Our dispatch is not only capable of answering calls and making updates, they are well-trained and able to solve all uncommon situations and make proper decisions.

jobsBenefits.title: Layover and Detention Pay
jobsBenefits.description: In our company dispatch is working hard and fighting with a broker for every penny of your extra wait time at the pick up or delivery facilities.

jobDescription.title: SOLO Truck Driver
jobDescription.description: SOLO truck driver job available. Weekly earnings up to $8000. Minimum 6 months driving experience required. Age 21 and above. Location within 100 miles radius from Alpharetta, GA.
payDetails: We pay 26-32% of the gross (forward all rate confirmations from the broker)
requirements: Decent MVR (no more than 3 moving violations in the past 36 months)
Hometown within 100 miles radius from Alpharetta, GA

jobDescription.title: TEAM Truck Driving
jobDescription.description: TEAM truck driver position open. Average weekly gross: $12000. Start pay: 30% of gross. Minimum 6 months driving experience, age 21+. Home weekends optional. Communication skills and smartphone with scanner app necessary.
payDetails: We pay: 30% of the gross on start
Forward all rate confirmations from the broker
requirements: Decent MVR (no more than 3 moving violations in the past 36 months)

jobDescription.title: Owner Operators
jobDescription.description: Owner Operators position open at Hermes Express Inc. Earn up to $8000 weekly gross revenue. We pay 88% of gross revenue. Competitive insurance rates, fuel cards, and trailer rental provided. No forced dispatch, no-touch freight. Safety bonuses, weekly settlements. Must be 21+, with clean MVR and 2 years experience.
payDetails: Otr – we pay: 88% of gross revenue
requirements: Clean MVR (no more than 3 moving violations in the past 36 months)
Safely transport the merchandise under FMCSA regulations
No felony convictions within 7 years (no NYC)
2 years experience is a must (insurance company requirements)
